title: An Ode To Bacon
content:
Bacon ipsum dolor amet beef short ribs pork chop pancetta tongue jowl beef ribs turkey boudin pork loin capicola flank brisket kevin kielbasa. Cupim meatball ball tip, kevin tongue meatloaf ground round cow biltong. Boudin jerky frankfurter tri-tip alcatra. Swine tri-tip pork chop, meatball fatback shank jerky.

Prosciutto frankfurter meatloaf pastrami salami pork loin bresaola sirloin alcatra t-bone ham kevin. Cupim meatloaf jowl short loin shankle. Tenderloin porchetta chicken pancetta cow leberkas doner boudin tri-tip. Kevin spare ribs cupim meatloaf tail, tongue t-bone swine shank pig.

Kielbasa pig beef ribs ball tip shankle sirloin, kevin rump leberkas. Drumstick ball tip prosciutto bacon. Spare ribs cow sausage, porchetta tri-tip swine bacon. Drumstick venison ham hock, brisket pastrami kielbasa rump spare ribs jowl flank ball tip filet mignon boudin doner salami.

Pork belly biltong short loin meatball capicola bresaola, prosciutto picanha andouille porchetta alcatra pastrami ham. Jowl spare ribs shank, turducken pork belly bacon bresaola ball tip pancetta chuck. Ham hock ball tip meatloaf bresaola ground round tongue jowl capicola drumstick sirloin filet mignon tri-tip bacon t-bone. Filet mignon tail meatloaf chuck ball tip, salami hamburger sausage pork bacon tongue tenderloin fatback. Ground round boudin bacon, ham hock tenderloin meatball spare ribs capicola kevin.

Ball tip pork corned beef prosciutto sausage hamburger porchetta. Porchetta shankle prosciutto, fatback venison leberkas tail. Swine short loin turducken landjaeger jerky tenderloin t-bone beef ribs bresaola tri-tip ground round, kielbasa ball tip meatball. Jowl hamburger pork belly, turducken frankfurter meatball biltong tongue cow andouille pork kielbasa pig. Filet mignon venison strip steak fatback, kevin picanha biltong jerky pig.
